title: Create your own wallpapers for iOS and macOS devices with the new ‘Acrylic’ app
content:
Choosing a new wallpaper for your phone or computer is not always an easy task. iOS doesn’t exactly have many options available, and searching for good images on the web can be a nightmare. However, thanks to the new “Acrylic” app, you can now create your own wallpapers for iOS and macOS devices.

more…

The post Create your own wallpapers for iOS and macOS devices with the new ‘Acrylic’ app appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Acrylic is focused on creating 3D and gradient wallpapers, which honestly are a perfect match for iOS and macOS devices.
